item.title: Tools
item.author: Author
item.description:
Tools

In this page you can find some of the active and public tools I am involved in.



AbU-lang:    a programming language for distributed and decentralized IoT applications, based on ECA rules and attribute-based interaction. The language is developed in collaboration with the MADS team at the University of Udine.


  ECA rules · Distributed systems · Formal methods · Edge computing · IoT programming
